description: This Thanksgiving, we're going to explore how best to make a Pomegranate Margarita. This drink is best served as an after-dinner cocktail and will satisfy your sweet tooth with the addition of pomegranate juice.
name: Pomegranate Margarita
recipeIngredient: Lime slices and pomegranate seeds for garnish

recipeInstructions.name: Combine salt and pomegranate juice in a small bowl with the back of a spoon until the juices taste salty. Cover your cocktail glass rim by rubbing it around an outer slice of lime to moisten, then dip into the salt mixture you created before.
